question.title: Valid Parentheses
prompt: Given a string {{ s }} containing just the characters {{ '(' }}, {{ ')' }}, {{ '{' }}, {{ '}' }}, {{ '[' }} and {{ ']' }}, determine if the input string is valid.

explanations: The input string '()' is valid because the brackets are balanced.
The input string '([)]' is not valid because the brackets are not balanced.

hints: Use a stack to keep track of opening brackets.
